name: ThisIsMyDungeon
description:
Cut them up, burn them, and throw them. No matter how you go about it in this fantastic action/strategy game.

You are a powerful mage armed with terrible weapons and spells. Defend your fortress from the ravages of enemy armed bands.

Will you cook your enemies in lava pits, smash them in traps and shatter them? It doesn't matter the weapon, as long as you carry out your suppression business!

Credit:

- Maxence Retier

- Noé Mouchel

- Benjamin Marin

- Felix Chevalier
